review: Doubts were effectively checked with tests and clarified . Good approach. Doctor saw the 2D echo live.
I talked with  doctor sarvan sir  on medibuddy . I found he is good because he tell me about my mother cardio problem with a good way so I came here to review

Dr.Sravan kumar sir taken very  good care about  heart patient and providing clear information  about condition .Happy with  hospitality and  supporting 
staff. Highly  recommend !
